import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{fetchBusinessTrips,deleteBusinessTrip}from'../services/api';// Komponente zur Anzeige der Geschäftsreisen
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BusinessTrips=_ref=>{let{setEditingTrip}=_ref;const[trips,setTrips]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchBusinessTrips().then(data=>setTrips(data));},[]);const handleDelete=id=>{deleteBusinessTrip(id).then(()=>{setTrips(trips.filter(trip=>trip.id!==id));});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"BusinessTrips",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Business Trips"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:trips.slice().reverse().slice(0,3).map(trip=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Destination:"})," ",trip.destination," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",trip.name," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",trip.email," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",trip.date,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"trip-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit-button",onClick:()=>setEditingTrip(trip),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>handleDelete(trip.id),children:"Delete"})]})]},trip.id))})]});};export default BusinessTrips;
